revised_title: Investigations of the Specific Heat of Solid and Liquid Bodies: A Historical Analysis and Method Development
tldr: The author, Hermann Kopp, investigates the specific heat of solid and liquid bodies, providing a historical analysis of previous research and a detailed description of his method of mixtures. He discusses the applicability of Dulong and Petit's law and the atomic heat of various elements and compounds, as well as the influence of physical conditions on specific heat.
